snippet.title: XON Episode Three - Puzzle adventure game  for Android  and iOS
snippet.description:
Check out the PC version - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147560/Lands_of_XON/

Puzzle adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven.
Available for android smartphones and tablets on Google play store

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagofx.XonEp3

NOTE: If you are stuck because of a bug, go to the game menu and tap 10 times on the XON logo. You will be teleported to the starting area so you can continue playing.

Walkthrough: http://imagofx.com/walkthrough/xonep3.html
